text.section: The adult members of a church may form a religious corporation as provided in this part.

The members shall:
Elect at least four individuals to act as trustees in the name of and on behalf of the church; and
Prepare a plan of the church.

The plan shall include:
The purposes for which the religious corporation is formed;
The name of the religious corporation and the church;
The time and manner for election and succession of trustees; and
The exact qualifications of individuals eligible:
To vote at elections; and
To be elected to office.
